Title: The Heiresses
Actors: Ana Brun, Margarita Irun, Ana Ivanova, Nilda Gonzalez
Plot: Chela and Chiquita are both descended from wealthy families in Asunción and have been together for over 30 years. But recently, their financial situation has worsened and they begin selling...
Country: Paraguay, France, Germany, Norway, Brazil, Uruguay, Italy
